scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, with a halo and radiant light emanating from behind his head, emerging from a sarcophagus or tomb. He is shown in a triumphant pose, with his right hand raised in blessing and his left hand holding a cross with a banner. Below him, two armored soldiers are shown in awe or surprise, one kneeling and the other standing. In the background, a cityscape with buildings and towers is visible, suggesting a terrestrial setting for this divine event. The overall composition suggests the Resurrection of Christ.
